greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=0, a(1)=1; thereafter a(n) = gpf(2*a(n-1)+a(n-2)), where gpf = "greatest prime factor" (A006530).
link: Greg Back and Mihai Caragiu, The Greatest Prime Factor and Recurrent Sequences, Fibonacci Quart. 48 (2010), no. 4, 358-362. [Discusses similar sequences]
program: lista(nn) = {print1(x=0, ", "); print1(y=1, ", "); for (n=2, nn, z = gpf(x+2*y); print1(z, ", "); x = y; y = z;);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 01 2016
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 19 2013
